question: Statements:In a one day cricket match, the total runs made by a team were 200. Out of these 160 runs were made by spinners.Conclusions:80% of the team consists of spinners.The opening batsmen were spinners.
answer_description: According to the statement, 80% of the total runs were made by spinners. So, I does not follow. Nothing about the opening batsmen is mentioned in the statement. So, II also does not follow.
